body: An exorcist inquisitor must close off her mind to deny her enemies even a foothold. At 17th level, the inquisitor becomes immune to compulsion effects and possession attempts (including magic jar). This ability replaces slayer.
name: Closed Mind
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Inquisitor/Inquisitor Archetypes/Exorcist/Closed Mind
